data.title: Famous actor refuses to recognize his newborn daughter, but is a father devoted to boys
data.meta_description: Famous actor Owen Wilson is the father of two sons Robert, 7, with his former partner Jade Duell and Fin, 4yearold Caroline Lindqvist In October, he became the father of a girlfriend with his former partner, Varunie Vongsvirates Us Weekly has announced that the actor refuses to meet his daughter, called Lyla  View this post on Instagram  My sweet little princess  Lyla Aranya Wilson, born on 100918  Post shared by Varunie varunie on  Oct 14, 2018 at 500 pm PDT  "Owen will not recognize her daughter, though Lyla is a copy of her She has white skin, blond hair and blue eyes l
data.text:
Famous actor Owen Wilson is the father of two sons Robert, 7, with his former partner Jade Duell and Fin, 4-year-old Caroline Lindqvist. In October, he became the father of a girlfriend with his former partner, Varunie Vongsvirates. Us Weekly has announced that the actor refuses to meet his daughter, called Lyla.

"Owen will not recognize her daughter, though Lyla is a copy of her. She has white skin, blond hair and blue eyes like her father, "said a source for Us Weekly. Although the actor and Varunie had a 5-year relationship, he did not even contact him during pregnancy and even after giving birth, even though he was aware. Owen has sought a fatherhood test in June, which did not rule out the possibility that he might be the father of the child. On the other hand, Owen is a father devoted to his two sons.
